title: Understanding ASD
text: ASD stands for Autism Spectrum Disorder. It is important to understand what this term encompasses.

title: Characteristics of ASD
text: ASD is characterized by challenges in communication, social interaction, and behavior. It is not a physical disability.

hintAnswer: a developmental disability that can result in significant delays and developmental differences in a number of areas, including communication, social interaction, and behavior
title: Identifying ASD
text: Which of the following best describes ASD?
choices: a developmental disability that can result in significant delays and developmental differences in a number of areas, including communication, social interaction, and behavior
a physical disability that can result in significant delays and developmental differences in a number of areas, including communication, social interaction, and behavior
a developmental disability that can result in significant delays in communication
